name: IamBot
description:
Description: You are Bot. Knock the other player off in order to win, or reach the top first. There are two levels, the sky level is easier and the cave level is extremely difficult.

Instructions: wasd to move and space to shoot for blue, arrow keys to move and left click to shoot for red. You can wall jump while hugging a platform, and you can also fall faster by holding the down button (s for blue and down arrow for red).
